name: Character Maker QR
first_mes:
Required Downloads

Lorebook that is need for it to work [Character Maker Combined NSFW Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW.json) Lorebook that controls generation for each generation [Character Maker Combined NSFW GenRaw Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW%20GenRaw.json) Sort it after Name A-Z Lorebook that contains user changeable inputs for generations. [Character Maker Combined NSFW Variables](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW%20Variables.json) Sort it after Name A-Z (Needed) ---

Quick Reply Sets

[Visible QR Buttons](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker.json) The only set you need to add to the Global Quick Reply Sets (Needed) It contains 3 buttons. - New Chat and Set Character Gender and Type (Makes a new chat and lets you select Gender, Type and transformation of the character. **Start with this**) - Character Generator Swipe (Lets you swipe the last message making a new one without loosing the old one) - Generate Character Choice (Lets you select what you want to generate next) [Character Maker Generation](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) All the logic for the Generate Character Choice button. (Needed) 01. Generate Basic Information (Needs to be first) 02. Generate Appearance information (Can be used multiple times) 03. Generate Personality Traits And Quirks 04. Character's Relation to user 05. Generate Relationship Information (Family, Friends, Enemies and Rivals) 06. Generate Known Kinks 07. Generate Latent Kinks (Will be hidden from the rest of the generation) 08. Generate Outfit and Gear (Can be used multiple times) 09. Generate Background Information 10. Generate Interaction Style 11. Generate Contextual Information (Setting and Daily Routine) 12. Additional Notes (Strengths, Weaknesses, Likes, Dislikes, Sexual Knowledge and Sexual Experience) 13. Spells and Abilities 14. Copy Character Rules (Copies the rules the character will follow to the chat from the Lorebook) 15. Generate Extras (Personality Summary and Speech Examples) 16. Generate Scenario (Makes a scenario that can be used as a first message) (Can make multiple) ---

Required External Downloads

[LALib](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-LALib) required for Character Maker LaLib Chat Quick Reply Sets (Needed) (Update needed for V6.0) ---

Optional Downloads

[TabbyAPI Models](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/TabbyAPI%20Loader%20Setting.json) Models and settings i have tried. [SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer) Addon for SillyTavern to see variables that are in use. (Recommended for debugging) To debug empty the Flushvar QR button from the "Character Maker V4" set. This let you see all variables that are used and if something is wrong you can probably find it here. a broken var usually looks likt this '{{something}}'. (This "button" empties all local variables that this cards buttons makes) --- For best result use a Empty Persona named user Start by pressing the QR button "New Chat and Set Character Gender and Type"
creatorcomment:
Using a empty persona is recommended. If you have any tips on refinements of the Lorebook/QR buttons as well if you want any new fields for the generation make a comment (On [chub.ai](https://chub.ai/characters/Drago87/character-maker-sillytavern-quick-reply-driven-0eb2c2852a4f) or on the [github](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker)) and i will look it over. Especially the `/genraw`

Example characters made with this

[Èmilie](https://chub.ai/characters/Drago87/emilie-63c2aa603413) [ST Chat files](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/tree/main/Chat%20Examples)

________________________________

Last Update

V6.0.7 - Beta Changed when pressing the 'Change Guidance' button it will keep the old guidance and let you edit it. Added a choice to sexual knowledge and variables for that in the lorebook When making a new character sets the persona to 'user' if it exists. If not it will make a temporary empty persona named 'user'. Fixed some genraw that used fnames instead of fname Added a way to have no dialect. Added a way to select what outfit you want to use for the scenario. Updated Character Rules Added a choice for for Known and Latent kinks that can be changed from a new [Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW%20Variables.json) (Needed) this makes it easier to guide the generations to what you want. Fixed missing | in known and latent kinks preventing old information to be purged. Added missed guidance for personality Fixed posting positive traits under negative traits loosing the negative traits altogether. Renamed Butt to Buttocks Added skin_color to generations (Had forgotten to add it to system in genraw) Added skin color and tanning to more generations. Fixed typo in genraw Fixed problems when using Debug mode during 'Basic Information' generation. Added Friend to user generation. Fixed spelling mistakes. Update [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) [GenRaw Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW%20GenRaw.json) [Character Maker Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW.json) V6.0.6 - Beta Updated character rules. Added Tag generation. Changed Personality in 'Extras' to Character Personality. Updated genraw to reflect changes. Fixed broken character rules. Added missing Redo button when adding fears. Fixed missed "foreach var" upgrade to the new system in outfit and gear. Moved choices for char's mother outside of the generation and added a button to change it. Added more information about char's mother in 'Relationship Information' (Added 'Remarried' and more information to 'Married') Fixed a error when making sibling and fixed whap happens when pressing the None button for siblings. When editing a reply i have change the cancel to redo the reply instead of stopping the generation altogether. These are the ones i have updated (Everything should be updated now) 02. Generate Appearance Info (Can Generate Multiple) 03. Generate Personality Traits And Quirks 04. Character's Relation to user 05. Generate Relationship Information 06. Generate Known Kinks 07. Generate Latent Kinks 08. Generate Outfit and Gear (Can Generate Multiple) 09. Generate Background Info 10. Generate Interaction Style 11. Generate Contextual Information 12. Generate Additional Notes 13. Generate Spells and Abilities 15. Generate Extras Update [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) [GenRaw Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW%20GenRaw.json) [Character Maker Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW.json) V6.0.5 - Beta When editing a reply i have change the cancel to redo the reply instead of stopping the generation altogether. (Only in 'Basic Information' for now. Will update the others as i go) Fixed error in Genres Fixed Full Name input Update [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) V6.0.4 - Beta Added more functionality to the debug mode. It will ask if you want to enable debug mode when making a new character. If debug mode is enabled it will let you see and edit what is passed to each /genraw. When copying rules you will be able to see and edit them in debug mode. When making a scenario debug mode lets you see and edit the prompt that is sent to the continue function. Update [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) V6.0.3 - Beta Added Guidance to missing generations Refined prompt for daily activities when making 'Contextual Information' by using a /genraw to ask the LLM if the characters occupation is deemed work or school. Added Full Name to the 'Basic Information' Changed Output format for the outfit to better indicate nudity. Added Why char like the kink to known kinks. Fixed genraw for user age. Added how the positive and negative traits manifests in the character. Fixed not emptying outputList Fixed Quirks not generating Fixed Infinite loop for Negative Traits Fixed Error when making female breasts. Fixed using same variable for different things breaking when generating user data. Fixed Tags to be uppercase. Fixed age choice for teacher and student when generating user data. Updated Choice 03. Generate Personality Traits And Quirks 04. Character's Relation to user 05. Generate Relationship Information 06. Generate Known Kinks 07. Generate Latent Kinks 08. Generate Outfit and Gear (Can Generate Multiple) 09. Generate Background Info 10. Generate Interaction Style 11. Generate Contextual Information 12. Generate Additional Notes 13. Generate Spells and Abilities 15. Generate Extras To the new LALib version Update [GenRaw Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW%20GenRaw.json) [Character Maker Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW.json) [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) [Character Maker QR](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker.json) V6.0.2 - Beta Fixed wrong check in Basic Information. Update [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) V6.0.1 - Beta Rewrote the Tags and Transform. Removed ethnicity from non-humans. Fixed Check for type of character. Fixed problem when making a character that can transform. Fixed wrong variable name error. Fixed ethnicity in information Fixed missed :}| in last_name breaking rerolling Fixed sub_species not saving giving a warning. Update [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) [Character Maker QR](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker.json) V6.0.0 - Beta These are the ones that have been updated to the new LALib version: ' New Chat and Set Character Gender and Type Character Generator Swipe Generate Character Choice Debug On/Off ' Generate Character Choice that are updated are: ' 01. Generate Basic Information (form) 02. Generate Appearance Info (Can Generate Multiple) 14. Copy Character Rules 16. Generate Scenario ' And all required QR buttons for the above. The rest should still work but will give warnings. Updated for new [LALib](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-LALib) version make sure to update. Added check to make sure LALib is installed and enabled. Added Skin Color for species without covering. Added printout for Realistic characters (Characters from shows/anime's/books etc..) only showing when selecting it on new character. Added spoken language (single or multiple) Added nationality and ethnicity to the generation. (option to ignore it) Added exclusion and guidance to most if not all dialogue options to help get the result you want. Added generation for user's Relation to the generated character. Moved the order of generation. Added guidance for 'Additional Notes' (Letting you prevent specific things from generating or pushing the generation towards specific things) Moved general exclusion from "Get Char Info" to Lorebook. Fixed minor typos and stuff Redownload [GenRaw Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW%20GenRaw.json) [Character Maker Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW.json) [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) [Character Maker QR](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker.json)

________________________________

All extra information like age/kinks/fears/species will guide the direction of the character. You can then edit the output to your liking or make it regen all of it. Then using [Intro Writer Chan](https://chub.ai/characters/fbdnchoco/intro-writer-chan-3721039feacc) You can generate a First Message If you can think of something to make it better plz make a comment or make a fork (then a comment with a link to the fork)

________________________________

Known Problems When using 'release' branch the FlushVar button will not work. (This should not have any negative effects.)(Not tested for a while now and the release branch may have been updated) If you want to manually remove the variables you can use [SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer) or manually remove them by first using the '/listvar' command to get all variables in use followed by '/flushvar x' where x is the variable name. Some subcategories need refining

________________________________

Version history V6.0.5 - Beta When editing a reply i have change the cancel to redo the reply instead of stopping the generation altogether. (Only in 'Basic Information' for now. Will update the others as i go) Fixed error in Genres Fixed Full Name input Update [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) V6.0.4 - Beta Added more functionality to the debug mode. It will ask if you want to enable debug mode when making a new character. If debug mode is enabled it will let you see and edit what is passed to each /genraw. When copying rules you will be able to see and edit them in debug mode. When making a scenario debug mode lets you see and edit the prompt that is sent to the continue function. Update [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) V6.0.3 - Beta Added Guidance to missing generations Refined prompt for daily activities when making 'Contextual Information' by using a /genraw to ask the LLM if the characters occupation is deemed work or school. Added Full Name to the 'Basic Information' Changed Output format for the outfit to better indicate nudity. Added Why char like the kink to known kinks. Fixed genraw for user age. Added how the positive and negative traits manifests in the character. Fixed not emptying outputList Fixed Quirks not generating Fixed Infinite loop for Negative Traits Fixed Error when making female breasts. Fixed using same variable for different things breaking when generating user data. Fixed Tags to be uppercase. Fixed age choice for teacher and student when generating user data. Updated Choice 03. Generate Personality Traits And Quirks 04. Character's Relation to user 05. Generate Relationship Information 06. Generate Known Kinks 07. Generate Latent Kinks 08. Generate Outfit and Gear (Can Generate Multiple) 09. Generate Background Info 10. Generate Interaction Style 11. Generate Contextual Information 12. Generate Additional Notes 13. Generate Spells and Abilities 15. Generate Extras To the new LALib version Update [GenRaw Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW%20GenRaw.json) [Character Maker Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW.json) [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) [Character Maker QR](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker.json) V6.0.2 - Beta Fixed wrong check in Basic Information. Update [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) V6.0.1 - Beta Rewrote the Tags and Transform. Removed ethnicity from non-humans. Fixed Check for type of character. Fixed problem when making a character that can transform. Fixed wrong variable name error. Fixed ethnicity in information Fixed missed :}| in last_name breaking rerolling Fixed sub_species not saving giving a warning. Update [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) [Character Maker QR](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker.json) V6.0.0 - Beta These are the ones that have been updated to the new LALib version: ' New Chat and Set Character Gender and Type Character Generator Swipe Generate Character Choice Debug On/Off ' Generate Character Choice that are updated are: ' 01. Generate Basic Information (form) 02. Generate Appearance Info (Can Generate Multiple) 14. Copy Character Rules 16. Generate Scenario ' And all required QR buttons for the above. The rest should still work but will give warnings. Updated for new [LALib](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-LALib) version make sure to update. Added printout for Realistic characters (Characters from shows/anime's/books etc..) only showing when selecting it on new character. Added spoken language (single or multiple) Added nationality and ethnicity to the generation. (option to ignore it) Added exclusion and guidance to most if not all dialogue options to help get the result you want. Added generation for user's Relation to the generated character. data.name: Character Maker QR
data.first_mes:
Required Downloads

Lorebook that is need for it to work [Character Maker Combined NSFW Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW.json) Lorebook that controls generation for each generation [Character Maker Combined NSFW GenRaw Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW%20GenRaw.json) Sort it after Name A-Z Lorebook that contains user changeable inputs for generations. [Character Maker Combined NSFW Variables](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW%20Variables.json) Sort it after Name A-Z (Needed) ---

Quick Reply Sets

Character's Relation to user 05. Generate Relationship Information (Family, Friends, Enemies and Rivals) 06. Generate Known Kinks 07. Copy Character Rules (Copies the rules the character will follow to the chat from the Lorebook) 15. Generate Extras (Personality Summary and Speech Examples) 16. Generate Scenario (Makes a scenario that can be used as a first message) (Can make multiple) ---

Required External Downloads

Optional Downloads

This let you see all variables that are used and if something is wrong you can probably find it here. a broken var usually looks likt this '{{something}}'. Removed ethnicity from non-humans. Fixed Check for type of character. Fixed problem when making a character that can transform. Fixed wrong variable name error. Fixed ethnicity in information Fixed missed :}| in last_name breaking rerolling Fixed sub_species not saving giving a warning. Update [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) [Character Maker QR](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker.json) V6.0.0 - Beta These are the ones that have been updated to the new LALib version: ' New Chat and Set Character Gender and Type Character Generator Swipe Generate Character Choice Debug On/Off ' Generate Character Choice that are updated are: ' 01. Generate Basic Information (form) 02. Generate Appearance Info (Can Generate Multiple) 14. Copy Character Rules 16. Generate Scenario ' And all required QR buttons for the above. The rest should still work but will give warnings. Updated for new [LALib](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-LALib) version make sure to update. Added check to make sure LALib is installed and enabled. Added Skin Color for species without covering. Added printout for Realistic characters (Characters from shows/anime's/books etc..) only showing when selecting it on new character. Added spoken language (single or multiple) Added nationality and ethnicity to the generation. (option to ignore it) Added exclusion and guidance to most if not all dialogue options to help get the result you want. Added generation for user's Relation to the generated character. Moved the order of generation. Added guidance for 'Additional Notes' (Letting you prevent specific things from generating or pushing the generation towards specific things) Moved general exclusion from "Get Char Info" to Lorebook. Fixed minor typos and stuff Redownload [GenRaw Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW%20GenRaw.json) [Character Maker Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW.json) [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) [Character Maker QR](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker.json)

________________________________

All extra information like age/kinks/fears/species will guide the direction of the character. You can then edit the output to your liking or make it regen all of it. Then using [Intro Writer Chan](https://chub.ai/characters/fbdnchoco/intro-writer-chan-3721039feacc) You can generate a First Message If you can think of something to make it better plz make a comment or make a fork (then a comment with a link to the fork)

________________________________

Known Problems When using 'release' branch the FlushVar button will not work. (This should not have any negative effects.)(Not tested for a while now and the release branch may have been updated) If you want to manually remove the variables you can use [SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer) or manually remove them by first using the '/listvar' command to get all variables in use followed by '/flushvar x' where x is the variable name. Some subcategories need refining

________________________________

Version history V6.0.5 - Beta When editing a reply i have change the cancel to redo the reply instead of stopping the generation altogether. (Only in 'Basic Information' for now. Will update the others as i go) Fixed error in Genres Fixed Full Name input Update [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) V6.0.4 - Beta Added more functionality to the debug mode. It will ask if you want to enable debug mode when making a new character. If debug mode is enabled it will let you see and edit what is passed to each /genraw. When copying rules you will be able to see and edit them in debug mode. When making a scenario debug mode lets you see and edit the prompt that is sent to the continue function. Update [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) V6.0.3 - Beta Added Guidance to missing generations Refined prompt for daily activities when making 'Contextual Information' by using a /genraw to ask the LLM if the characters occupation is deemed work or school. Added Full Name to the 'Basic Information' Changed Output format for the outfit to better indicate nudity. Added Why char like the kink to known kinks. Fixed genraw for user age. Added how the positive and negative traits manifests in the character. Fixed not emptying outputList Fixed Quirks not generating Fixed Infinite loop for Negative Traits Fixed Error when making female breasts. Fixed using same variable for different things breaking when generating user data. Fixed Tags to be uppercase. Fixed age choice for teacher and student when generating user data. Updated Choice 03. Generate Personality Traits And Quirks 04. Character's Relation to user 05. Generate Relationship Information 06. Generate Known Kinks 07. Generate Latent Kinks 08. Generate Outfit and Gear (Can Generate Multiple) 09. Generate Background Info 10. Generate Interaction Style 11. Generate Contextual Information 12. Generate Additional Notes 13. Generate Spells and Abilities 15.
